modules.description: Processes OCaml source files through a series of AST transformations to output modified code, supporting direct command-line invocation with minimal setup. Operates on OCaml abstract syntax trees and source files, applying registered transformers in sequence. Enables quick inspection of pre-processed code without manual command-line configuration.

Compares two files using a specified diff command or defaults to `patdiff` with a fallback to `diff -u`. Accepts options for color output and file paths. Used to visually highlight differences between text files in a controlled manner.
